snippet: Do you think New York and other cities can bring down crime without aggressively using stop-and-frisk? Do you think the police can use the tactic without violating constitutional rights?
abstract: Do you think New York and other cities can bring down crime without aggressively using stop-and-frisk? Do you think the police can use the tactic without violating constitutional rights?
lead_paragraph: In this 2010 video about stop-and-frisk, The Times investigates the use of the tactic in one Brooklyn neighborhood.

headline.main: What Do You Think of the Police Tactic of Stop-and-Frisk?
